claim: Flublok is produced using a novel production platform in which recombinant HA is expressed in insect cells using a baculovirus expression vector system (BEVS).
explanation: Top of a journal article page showing the Vaccine journal header with Elsevier and ScienceDirect logos and a link to the journal homepage. The image only displays the journal title and publisher information and does not include any details about Flublok production or the use of a baculovirus expression vector system, so it does not support the claim. Note: The image is clear but contains only publication header content; no relevant production platform information is present.
